title: Chicks In The Office, Porn Blockers, Live In A Restaurant, and Jeans vs Pajamas
description:
Ria & Fran join the show to talk about their People's Choice nomination (#ChicksInTheOffice #ThePopPodcast #PCAs) and checking IG stories. KFC and Feits debate jeans vs pajamas and discuss the Barstool hit pieces and the blue check brigade. Voicemailsinclue:Â 

What fast food restaurant would you want to live in, Happy Bangiversar, GF blocks porn, What if the podcast broke up


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kfcr
